content.text: Hey! My name is [user 1 name].
Hey! My name is [user 2 name].
What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I also like to remodel homes.
That's cool! I'm a college student and a full-time working mom. I hope to be a doctor one day.
That's amazing! What kind of doctor do you want to be?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about being a pediatric surgeon.
That would be great! I'm sure you'd be a great doctor.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what are your favorite hobbies?
I love to read, go shopping, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do those things too, except I also like to remodel homes and go hunting.
That's cool! I've never been hunting before.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
Maybe I will.
So, what's your favorite holiday?
My favorite holiday is Halloween. I love the costumes, the decorations, and the candy.
Me too! Halloween is my favorite holiday too. I love dressing up as different characters and going trick-or-treating.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope we can get together for Halloween this year.
That would be great! I'd love to get together with you for Halloween.
